com.dnsun.filesearch

Class RegexContentFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dnsun.filesearch.RegexContentFileFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.FileFilter, java.io.FilenameFilter, org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.IOFileFilter

    public class RegexContentFileFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.IOFileFilter
    Decorator that filters for file content matching a regular expression in addition to wrapped filter.
